_header: Sir for your grace both night and day
_description: William Dunbar, To the King, ‘That he war Jhone Thomsonnis man’ — eight quatrains with refrain, ‘God ȝif ye war Johne Thomsonnis man’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Schir for ȝour grace bayth nicht and dayRicht hartlie on my
                    kneis I pray…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Than pray I god and sweit sanct anGif þat ȝe war
                    Iohne thomsounis man
